fields.description: There is a staging directory appearing. It should not.
fields.summary: Some tests in mapreduce-client-app are writing outside of target

comments.body:
From a recent patch run:

{code}
Lines that start with ????? in the ASF License  report indicate files that do not have an Apache license header:
 !????? /testptch/hadoop/hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app/staging/history/done_intermediate/TestAppMasterUser/job_1317529182569_0004-1448284959695-TestAppMasterUser-%3Cmissing+job+name%3E-1448284959873-0-0-FAILED-default-1448284959695.jhist
 !????? /testptch/hadoop/hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app/staging/history/done_intermediate/TestAppMasterUser/job_1317529182569_0004_conf.xml
 !????? /testptch/hadoop/hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app/staging/history/done_intermediate/TestAppMasterUser/job_1317529182569_0004.summary
 !????? /testptch/hadoop/hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app/staging/TestAppMasterUser/.staging/job_1317529182569_0004/job_1317529182569_0004_2_conf.xml
 !????? /testptch/hadoop/hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app/staging/TestAppMasterUser/.staging/job_1317529182569_0004/COMMIT_STARTED
 !????? /testptch/hadoop/hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app/staging/TestAppMasterUser/.staging/job_1317529182569_0004/job_1317529182569_0004_2.jhist
 !????? /testptch/hadoop/hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app/staging/TestAppMasterUser/.staging/job_1317529182569_0004/COMMIT_FAIL
{code}

00 patch fixes the issue and includes minor refactoring.
* Fix: Move staging directory from {{staging}} to {{testDir/staging}}.
* Refactor: Change {{testDir}} from File to Path to remove redundant code.
* Refactor: Move {{localFs}} to local variable.

bq. Can you check if it sounds good? If so, I will commit it shortly.

Sounds like we are updating patch at the same time. :) 
Anyway, 04 patch is exactly the same as 004 patch. I will commit it after Jenkins report positive.

This message was automatically generated.
I have commit 04 patch to trunk and branch-2. Thanks [~ajisakaa] for the contribution!

bq. I have commit 04 patch to trunk and branch-2.

I've removed the 3.0.0 fix version.  Please don't add 3.0.0 when you commit to an earlier branch. It messes up the autogenerated reports and it goes against the committer guidelines. Thanks.

Was doing an audit of 2.8 commits. Found that the commit message missed including the JIRA number. Here's the commit for posterity, it is already in trunk, branch-2 and branch-2.8..
{code}
commit 15d577bfbb3f18fc95251d22378b53aa4210115f
Author: Junping Du <junping_du@apache.org>
Date:   Wed Nov 25 09:15:26 2015 -0800

    Tests in mapreduce-client-app are writing outside of target. Contributed by Akira AJISAKA.
{code}
